title: 'The Polar Plunge' Name Drawing + Lunchbox's Wish Balloon FOUND! + Celebrity Catchphrase Game
itunes:title: 'The Polar Plunge' Name Drawing + Lunchbox's Wish Balloon FOUND! + Celebrity Catchphrase Game
description:
Lunchbox wanted to change his bad luck streak and proposed another drawing... this time the loser has to do the polar plunge this weekend! We draw names and the last one has to do it. Lunchbox got a package because someone found the balloon he released last month with his wishes. What did he get?? We find out! We play the celebrity catchphrase game! Bobby reads catchphrase and we have to name the celeb it belongs to! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
